level.heading: Practice in court.
level.text: Unless specifically provided to the contrary in this chapter or inconsistent with its provisions, the rules of the court, including the rules concerning vacation of orders and appellate review, govern proceedings under this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-204
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-204, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 21-2001.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 1-304 of the Uniform Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Act (1982 Act).
